name: InstaKin
headline: Financial Platform for Migrant Families in America

founders.name: Yasir Shirazi, Founder
founders.description: CEO @ InstaKin. Serial Entrepreneur. Passionate about building a Platform dedicated to the needs of Migrant  Communities globally.

founders.name: Zain Khan, Founder
founders.description:
Spent first half of my career in the banking/finance industry focusing on implementing payment technologies. In the last 10 years I have worked in 2 startups (not including Instakin) - one related to semi-conductors and the other related to a platform for social media marketing.

I have also worked for Fortune 500 companies (Fiserv and LexisNexis) where I led teams to deliver next generation products related to core banking systems and AI.

  * [![InstaKin](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/instakin-logo-web-1.png)](https://instakin.com/<https:/instakin.com/>)


[![InstaKin](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/instakin-logo-web-1.png)](https://instakin.com/<https:/instakin.com/> "InstaKin")
  * [Home](https://instakin.com/<https:/instakin.com/>)
  * [About Us](https://instakin.com/<https:/instakin.com/about-us/>)
  * [Press](https://instakin.com/<https:/instakin.com/press/>)
  * [FAQ‚Äôs](https://instakin.com/<https:/instakin.com/faqs/>)


[ CredKin ](https://instakin.com/<https:/credkin.com/>)
## Welcome to InstaKin We help you take care of loved ones back home
Download our App and take care of your family back home. With InstaKin you can easily pay bills, send gifts, handle documentation tasks, and we also offer a concierge service for special requests.With thousands of users across more than 60 Countries, InstaKin is the preferred choice of Overseas Pakistanis.
[ ![](https://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/App-Store-Link.png) ](https://instakin.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/pk/app/instakin/id1543515433>)
[ ![](https://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Play-Store-Link.png) ](https://instakin.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.app.instakin.com&hl=en&gl=US&pli=1>)
## InstaKin in Now on WhatsApp!
On the demand of our customers from 60+ countries we have launched our Whatsapp Bot so they can place orders for their friends and family from the Whatsapp. With Instakin you can easily pay bills, send gifts, handle documentation tasks, and we also offer a concierge service for special requests. 
![](https://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/whatsapp-mobile.png)
## Our Core Services for Overseas Pakistanis
Whether you are located in the US or UAE or Australia, we can help you easily manage tasks back home in Pakistan.
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Instashop.png)
### InstaShop
### InstaShop
Our convenient ecommerce store located within our app. You can now easily purchase consumer electronics, gifts, toys, and mobile phones to surprise your loved ones back home. It's a hassle-free way to shop and bring joy to your family and friends. Simply browse our selection and make their day with a thoughtful gift. InstaShop makes online shopping simple and accessible for everyone.
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/InstaRunner.png)
### InstaRunner
### InstaRunner
Introducing InstaRunner, your go-to delivery service for all your parcel needs. With InstaRunner, we have a team of fast and reliable couriers ready to swiftly transport your packages to their destination. Whether it's documents, gifts, groceries, or important errands, our dedicated runners are here to provide prompt and dependable delivery right to your doorstep.
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Special-Requests.png)
### Special Request
### Special Request
Special Request, the ultimate solution for all your unique needs back home. Whether you require urgent delivery of consumer electronics, property management services, need plumber or electrician for any job or any other special task, we've got you covered. Our dedicated team is ready to handle your requests promptly and efficiently. Sit back and relax as we go above and beyond to fulfill your special requirements.
## Key Features
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Payments.png)
### Secure Payments
### Secure Payments
State-of-the-art security features ensure your payment details are kept safe and secure.
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/live-chat.png)
### Live Chat
### Live Chat
Talk to your vendor in real-time to get updates and answer any questions.
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Cross-platform.png)
### Cross-Platform
### Cross-Platform
An app designed for iOS and Android phones.
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Intuitive-Interface.png)
### Intuitive Interface
### Intuitive Interface
Get started with the app quickly with its easy-to-use yet powerful features.
## Testimonials
![Avatar](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/t-1.jpg)
### Sidrah Imtiaz Sohaib
October 25, 2021
![Rating](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/stars.png)
I just love this app. I was able to deliver cake for my dad's birthday who is in karachi. It was delivered on time and in perfect condition and exactly the one which i asked for. I am definitely going to try this app for other things too. The best thing was the payment method which was very secure. Thankyou instakin.
![Avatar](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/t-2.jpg)
### Aemen Farooq
December 4, 2021
![Rating](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/stars.png)
I'm extremely happy that I found this app. My younger brother got results and I wanted to surprise him, they did all for me exactly the way I picturedüòç. It was soo worth to see his reaction. The communication went so smoothly and friendly, no matter how indecisive I was, the lady was friendly thoroughly üòç
![Avatar](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/t-3.jpg)
### Rabia Adnan
January 20, 2022
![Rating](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/stars.png)
What a great and useful app!!! Super easy to use. Very helpful staff! I made my first order. And it was super quick delivery! I highly recommend this app. Can't wait to place more order through Instakinüôåüôå
![Avatar](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/t-4.jpg)
### Usman Mohammad Nawaz
January 19, 2022
![Rating](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/stars.png)
PERFECT. I had a very great experience dealing with this App. My order was processed in a little more then 24 hours. It was on it's location sahi salamat. Kudos to the developers of this App & it's initiative.
![Avatar](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/t-1.jpg)
### Aqusa Hockla
November 6, 2021
![Rating](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/stars.png)
Super app. Thank you instakin. It was so easy coustomer service was so helpful. I sent food to my family and they were so surprised.
![Avatar](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/t-2.jpg)
### Muhammad Asim Farooqui
January 15, 2022
![Rating](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/stars.png)
Professional people doing a wonderful service in a reliable & convenient way for overseas Pakistanis. Got my original documents attested & can assure they are highly reliable with a great customer support.
![Avatar](https://ninzio.com/sublime/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/t-3.jpg)
### Kashif Manzar Khan

Best app for overseas pakistanis very smartly resolve all issues. great job
## Press Coverage
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Y-Combinator.png)
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Daily-Finance.png)
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Venture-Insider.png)
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Tech-in-Asia.png)
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Tech-Times.png)
![icon](http://instakin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Arab-News.png)
## FAQ's
### What is InstaKin?
InstaKin was started to help immigrants and expats manage tasks back home. As immigrants, we all have had unpleasant experiences where we sent money back home for tasks and later found out that the funds were misused and there were unexpected delays. We want to make sure that you do not face such problems again. We work with verified and trusted service-providers in your home country so you do not have to waste time and energy looking for busy friends or family members or unknown vendors.
### What if a vendor does not provide satisfactory level of services? Who do I call?
All your transactions are protected by our ‚ÄúInstaKin Guarantee‚Äù. If you are not happy with the quality of work done, just contact us via the ‚ÄúContact Us‚Äù form and we will take every step to ensure you are satisfied.
### What is covered in Special Requests?
This is specifically for customers who may have some task they need to complete that are not on the regular list of services InstaKin provides. We understand the immigrants face a lot of challenges getting tasks back home and we want to be able to cater to those on-off needs. We have an excellent customer focused team of experts to manage your special requests. If you do not see a specific request in the app that matches your need then use the ‚ÄúSpecial Request Service‚Äù and tell us how we can help you.
### How do I pay for the services that I select on the app?
You can pay by using your credit/debit card just as you would on any other app or website.
### Are my credit/debit card transactions secure?
The entire InstaKin platform is built on a platform with the latest and most secure technologies. We are integrated with one the world‚Äôs leading payment gateways and you can be rest assured that all of your transactions are secure and private.
#### Subscribe to our mailing list. Join our mail list to receive our newsletter
We'll keep you up to date with our latest news, insights, free resources, and much more.
Don't worry, we won't spam you.

generated_description:
**InstaKin: Empowering Migrant Families in America**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Winter 2021 batch, InstaKin has quickly become a vital financial platform tailored for migrant families in the United States. Located in Boston, this nimble fintech startup has a dedicated team of 15 employees, driven by the mission to simplify how expats manage their responsibilities back home.

### What They Do

InstaKin is not just your average neobank. They offer a comprehensive suite of services aimed at Overseas Pakistanis, ensuring that managing family matters across borders is hassle-free. Users can:

- **Pay Bills:** Easily take care of family expenses directly from their app.
- **Send Gifts:** Use InstaShop to purchase electronics, toys, or custom gifts to surprise loved ones back home.
- **Delivery Services:** With InstaRunner, they provide reliable delivery for parcels of all kinds, from documents to groceries.
- **Special Requests:** This unique feature allows customers to request services outside the standard offerings, catering to specific needs like finding local service providers.
- **Concierge Service:** For those unique or urgent tasks, InstaKin goes the extra mile by handling requests directly.

Their app is designed to facilitate seamless transactions with robust security measures in place, ensuring customers‚Äô data and financial information remain safe.

### Broad User Base

InstaKin already serves thousands of users across over 60 countries, establishing its footprint as a go-to choice for Overseas Pakistanis. They‚Äôve made strides recently, launching a WhatsApp Bot to streamline order placement directly through the messaging platform‚Äîa nod to the demand for user-friendly and accessible services in today's mobile-centric world.

### User Experience

The response from users has been overwhelmingly positive. Several testimonials highlight InstaKin's reliable service and customer support, from timely deliveries to handling special requests with care. Their app is available on both iOS and Android, featuring an intuitive interface that makes it easy for anyone to get started.

### The Future

With a vision to continuously evolve and adapt to the needs of migrant families, InstaKin is well-positioned in the fintech space. Backed by influential partners like Michael Seibel from Y Combinator, and resonating with its target audience through tailored services, InstaKin is a prime example of how technology can bridge gaps created by distance and facilitate community support.

InstaKin is more than just a financial platform; it's a lifeline for families striving to maintain connections and responsibilities across borders. As they grow, one can only expect them to innovate further, making life simpler for the millions of expatriates around the globe.
